sentences.en: A church bell usually resides in a steeple and the exercise involved has to do with repeatedly pulling on a rope.
sentences.cn: 教堂的钟通常放在一个尖顶中，需要做的劳动就是要重复不停的拉绳子。

sentences.en: At twenty - five he won a three - mile steeple - chase against the most rugged competitor.
sentences.cn: 在 二十五 岁的时候,他在三哩 越野 比赛中战胜了最强壮的竞争对手.

sentences.en: He saw the faraway steeple, a bell began ringing.
sentences.cn: 他看见远处的教堂尖塔, 钟开始鸣响.

sentences.en: I checked my watch against the steeple clock.
sentences.cn: 我根据教堂尖塔的大钟对了表.

sentences.en: Maidan, then seventeen, was sold, taken to England and put to steeple chase racing.
sentences.cn: 麦登在十七岁时就被卖掉了, 后被带到英国参加越野赛跑.

sentences.en: Most Norman churches feature a tall steeple.
sentences.cn: 高高的尖塔是多数诺曼教堂的特色所在.

sentences.en: Near 80 degrees steeple staircases make you look surprisingly supernatural.
sentences.cn: 近80度的石阶让你惊心动魄,震撼于这自然的魔力.

sentences.en: One witness called it “the most frightening thing of my entire life,” And television footage showed a person clinging to a window in the cathedral’s steeple.
sentences.cn: 一位目击者说这是他有生以来遇到的最恐怖事件。 电视录像显示一人此时紧贴在尖塔的窗户上。

sentences.en: Parliament has resolved that women could also participate in steeple jack.
sentences.cn: 议会最近通过一项新的决议,决定妇女可以参加高空作业.

sentences.en: RS Prussia Steeple Mold Creamer & Sugar Bowl!
sentences.cn: 遥感普鲁士斯蒂普尔 克里默 和糖碗!

sentences.en: Soldiers using a multiple rocket launcher scored a direct hit on the steeple of a church.
sentences.cn: 士兵们使用多管火箭筒直接击中一所教堂的尖塔。

sentences.en: That boy can climb like a steeple jack.
The part of a tower or steeple in which bells are hung.
sentences.cn: 钟楼或尖塔悬挂钟的部分.

sentences.en: The steeple rears far into the sky.
They all hinge together like bats in a steeple.
sentences.cn: 他们像尖塔里的蝙蝠似的靠拢在一起.

trans.tran_cn: （教堂的）尖塔，尖顶，（女用）尖塔形头巾
trans.tran_en: a tall pointed tower on the roof of a church
